name: Adax
description:
Adax is a simple 2d endless platformer where you control Adax the dino to avoid obstacles and get a taste of his best treat (mushrooms) to rack up score. Guiding Adax is also a very good way to pass time.

PS - This game was built as a project for a job interview. Although I didn't get the job I can get your support to build bigger better games.

 Have fun!!!
